message:
We are lucky to have an amazing online community helping us spread awareness about trafficking. We couldn't do it without you! Let us know if you want to see something new or different on our social media channels. 
Thank you Chris Strub - #TeamStrub for the work you do highlighting non-profits through live streaming. 
“ERASE Child Trafficking uses Facebook Live regularly, including this video marking Human Trafficking Awareness Day. ”

data.description: Nonprofits often wonder why their Facebook content -- and particularly their live-streaming videos -- are not receiving a lot of traditional engagement. But success often comes when nonprofits look beyond the 'like' button to measure genuine impact.
data.title: Why Eschewing Public Engagement Is Your Nonprofit's Key To Facebook Live Video Success
